name: furniture sri lanka
short_description:
Since 1982 ARATUWA WOODWORKS satisfied the customer demands of Srilankan furniture industry. Our workshops are based in Moratuwa as you know the main city which operates in Sri Lankan furniture supply
Description
Aratuwa Wood works manufacturers, distributes without having showrooms or marketing staff because we directly deal with our respectful customers. By minimizing our costs we ensure to give you the best value for all our wooden furniture products.

15 YEARS GUARANTEE FOR THE WOOD.
The best price for the highest quality furniture.
Custom make your furniture the way you want.
Why pay more when you can buy direct from the manufacture and save money.
